data.title: Find Affordable Housing Via Your Local Council
data.meta_description: We partner with local councils across the country to offer affordable rental properties. Find out more.
data.text:
We recommend that you contact your local authority to register for housing with them as this would allow you to apply for any properties via nomination.

Select your region to find out who to contact

West Midlands

We currently don't work directly with any social housing partners in the West Midlands.

The best thing to do is contact your local council. They will be able to point you towards social housing providers in your area.

Scotland

Castle Rock Edinvar trading as Places for People Scotland provides our social housing in Scotland.

Areas we currently cover include:

Edinburgh

East Lothian

Midlothian

West Lothian

Stirling

Clackmannan

East Dunbartonshire

Falkirk

Find social rent housing in Scotland

Wales

We currently don't work directly with any social housing partners in Wales.

The best thing to do is contact your local council. They will be able to point you towards social housing providers in your area.
